resettle.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to go to live in a new country or area, or to help people do this
resettle.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The tribesmen were forcibly resettled by the government.
resettle.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to start using an area again as a place to live
resettle.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The area was resettled in the latter half of the century.
